title: The Forgiveness Protocol
outcome: Oksana's leaked evidence reveals a forgotten BCI 'forgiveness protocol'—a last-resort amnesty command Halden installed. Bitter debate sweeps Stenograd. After days of heated assemblies, a citywide vote narrowly chooses to activate it, nullifying old scores, freeing the flagged, and launching massive, disorderly reconciliation—forcing the city to confront its capacity to forgive or forget.

events.description: A former Council agent leaks Oksana's document revealing the existence of the BCI forgiveness protocol, stirring shock and protest.
Mass rallies, both for and against, erupt as residents debate wiping BCI scores. False rumors of Council sabotage fuel heated confrontations.
A citywide paper ballot referendum is held amid chaos. Results are close: activation of the forgiveness protocol wins by a razor-thin margin.
The BCI forgiveness protocol is triggered, erasing scores and freeing flagged citizens. Hundreds celebrate, while others mourn the erasure of old grievances or lost advantages.
City life is thrown into disarray; neighborhood rivalries flare, alliances shift, and the meaning of community is hotly contested in Stenograd's uncertain rebirth.
